data.title: Otoko no Aishikata
title_synonyms: The Way to Love a Man

data.title: Warera Takarara Corporation
data.title_japanese: われら宝裸コーポレーション
title_synonyms: Ookina Vibe no Sha no Shita de-
data.synopsis: Industrial espionage! Explosions! Hot spring resorts! Mountain Hermits! And Ex-lovers with mysterious intentions – It's all just part of a day's work for Tatsuya Okazaki and Harumi Fujishima of the Naked Jewel's Corporation, Japan's number one vibrator company. Follow the adventures of Okazaki and Fujishima as they strive to uncover the best methods of joy to give to all of those looking for a bit of love. When it’s Sakurai-sensei, a story about two men who are gung-ho about enhancing all couples’ sexual ecstasy (no matter the sex!) as part of their work routine - It is sure to be not just your everyday salary-man affair! (Source: DramaQueen)

data.title: Yuri to Yura
data.synopsis: Very interesting & impressive human comedy series about two boys who have been brought up at orphanage like real brothers : Yuri and Yura are students who are living at same orphanage. Yuri is very intelligent and always teaches Yura who has only the talent of boxing to be recommended by. But after taking a bath together, Yura begins to avoid Yuri's care. Yuri finally tells Yura his feeling and dashes out of the house in the snowy day like the day when they were abandoned at orphanage... (Source: MU) Included one-shot: Ousegahama

data.title: Koi no Kawaki
data.synopsis: Orie Nakano's girlfriend is cheating on him with two other men! One is the mysteriously untouchable Tatsumi, and the other is the basketball-playing upperclassman that Orie idolizes. But things are far from being as simple as they seem, and now the three men are inevitably pulled towards each other and bond together by their love for Yuka, which extends much farther than just the girl herself. Love, admiration and lust intermingle around them in an inescapble spiral in this coming of age sexy romance. (Source: MU)

data.title: Kyou, Hana no Gotoshi
data.synopsis: 1. Kyou, Hana no Gotoshi 2. Gi ni Ryouran 3. Isagiyoku Hanayaka ni 4. Hajimari wa Koibito-yaku 5. Renryo ni Sakasete 6. Two x Two Rings

data.title: Trigger
title_synonyms: Me in the Palm of a Hand
data.synopsis: 1. Trigger 2. Steal Me 3-4. Risky Bet 5. Tenohira no Ue no Boku (Me in the Palm of a Hand) 6. Megane no Chikara (The Power of Glasses) 7. My Fair Prince 8. Okinimesu mama (As You Like It) 9. Fever

data.title: 2-14 jiken
data.synopsis: In continuation to where Venus Kiss left off, Ikumi and Kunitachi are finally hitting it off steadily. However, trouble starts once again during Valentine's Day when Ikumi received a box of chocolates containing glasses and several other pranks. In the end when the person revealed himself to Ikumi, the past was unfold. Unconsciously jealous over what he's afraid to know, Ikumi threw a fit and said something cruel towards Kunitachi. Unable to take it, Kunitachi raped Ikumi... (from B-U)

data.title: Venus Kiss
data.synopsis: Ikumi has always admired his sempai, but one day... his sempai takes advantage of that.

data.title: Ore no Shita de Agake
title_synonyms: Ore no Shita de Agake Higuchi
data.synopsis: Manga based on the BL game developed by Alice Blue. Each storyline has a different author: Prologue: Akira Norikazu Kurosaki x Higuchi: Reno Amagi Kurosaki x Shimizu: Reibun Ike Kurosaki x Yamaguchi: Ryou Sakura Kurosaki x Yoshioka: Wren Tamaquis (Source: M-U)
1. $10 2. Tokage no Shippo (Lizard's Tail) 3-4. Utsukushiku, Yasashii Kimi. (The Kind and Beautiful You)

data.title: Nigai Kajitsu
data.synopsis: 1) A bitter fruit (Nigai Kajitsu) The first story is of a man who was locked out of his apartment while his wife was together with another man. He fainted as he was sick, and his neighbour who passed by, took him home... 2-3) Dark Passion A high school student is submitting to sex with a yakuza in order to repay his father's debts. The father was keeping drugs for the yakuza but ended up using them and became addicted. The only bright light in the student's life is his lover, but one day he makes a horrible discovery. 4) BLUE PERIOD The last story is the prequel to the first story in "Last Kiss Kara Hajimeyou {Let's begin with our LAST KISS.}". A mixed japanese-black student in a school is attracted to a chinese, who looks like the japanese cousin he likes. He heard rumours that the chinese boy caused a male teacher to quit cos they were caught together... (Source: MangaUpdates)

data.title: Bull to Arukeba...
data.synopsis: 1-4. Bull to Arukeba... 5. Project Robinson 6. Get! 7. Shouta-kun to Matsuchiyo-kun.

data.title: Dive
data.synopsis: Onizawa is a detective who recently got a divorce. One of his colleagues, Honda, is murdered in what seems to be linked to other detectives that have been murdered. Yashiro is another detective that Onizawa has taken an interest in, but also seems to have had a close relationship with Honda in some way. Because of how young he is though how did he know Honda and can Onizawa get closer to Yashiro who strongly dislikes him? (Source: MU)

data.title: Natsukoi
data.synopsis: 1. Natsukoi 2. Fuyukoi 3. Room Mate 4. Parasite Honey 5. Mujina 6. Bull Futatabi 2001 7. Amamiya-kun: 3 Years After

data.title: Gaten na Aitsu
data.title_english: Gaten na Aitsu: Manly Construction Training
data.synopsis: The son of the owner of a construction firm is harassed by his seniors in school. His father's live-in worker happens to pass by while he was being assaulted... Included one-shot: P.B.B.

data.title: Kawaige
title_synonyms: Maybe I Am Your Stepping Stone!?!
data.synopsis: This volume is a spin-off from Stepping Stone. Story 01 - Continuation of the relationship between Hirosue Kenji and Mogi Kousei who makes his first appearance in the fourth story of Stepping Stone. Story 02 & Story 03 - Nakano Shunji finds himself getting involved with a younger fellow co-worker, Mejiro "Yasu" Yasushi, who harbours a dark secret. Hirosue and Mogi make appearances. Story 04 - A love triangle of two high school boys and their teacher. Story 05 - About Delicacy Story 06 - The Best! Story 07 - Daylight - A love triangle of two high school boys and their teacher. Plus there is an Omake at the end. Please also note, Play Boy Blues, Gaten na aitsu, Kawaige, Stepping Stone, Punch Up! and Otonage. are loosely connected.
data.background: Kawaige was published in English as Maybe I'm Your Steppin' Stone by Digital Manga Publishing's 801 Media Inc. imprint on March 20, 2008.

data.title: Kimi Sae Ireba...
data.synopsis: 1-3) Nothing Without You The continuation of the love story between the son-in-law and his deceased wife's father. Sequel to Kimi Sae Oreba... (chapter 3 of Zange). 4) Right Hand Man A boy is troubled over the fact that he has no interest in the opposite sex. 5) Bringing Up Puppy in Machida's Short extra of Nothing Without You. (Source: Baka Updates)

data.title: Punch↑
data.synopsis: Architect Motoharu Maki is hanging out at the construction site ogling a particular hunky, well-toned construction worker when he is unexpectedly reunited with his lost cat, Shinobu. The reunion is all thanks to Kouta Ohki, a foul-mouthed young ironworker who found and cared for the lost cat. Unfortunately for Kouta, this act of kindness led to his eviction! When Motoharu agrees to take in young Kouta, will he be able to tame this feisty stray? (Source: SuBLime) Included one-shot: Volume 1: Sweet♥Train

data.title: Stepping Stone
data.synopsis: Sakai Kazuya is a 23-year-old man in love. Unfortunately, the object of his affection is a lovely woman only interested in well educated men. Sakai never finished high school and has been living off of his brawn, not his brains. So he enlists the help of her younger brother, Izumi Masashi, to help him pass the high school entrance exam, his first step toward to becoming a well-educated man. Izumi is happy to help, but his services come with a very steep fee. And, Izumi isn't interested in money, he has his sights on some of Sakai's other assets... (Source: 801 Media)
data.background: Stepping Stone was published in English as I'm Not Your Steppin' Stone by Digital Manga Publishing's 801 Media Inc. imprint on December 6, 2007.

data.title: Konna Otoko ni Dare ga Shita
title_synonyms: Who Made Him Such a Man
data.synopsis: A collection of yaoi stories. 1. Who Made Him Such a Man? 2. 37°C 3. Costly Ecstasy 4. Black Door

data.title: Aniki Joutou
data.synopsis: Ryuusei has always admired his hard-working, sex-magnet brother Ichirou. After witnessing brothers Ichirou and Gou in an incestuous embrace, Ryuusei questions his own desire to monopolize Ichirou's affections. Much hilarity and angst ensues as numerous revelations assault their relationship. Will Ryuusei's rebelliousness and jealous acts win out against Ichirou's attempts to over-protect him with lies and obfuscation? (Source: MU) Included one-shot: Volume 1: Gentle Green

data.title: Zange
title_synonyms: Zange - A Confession of his Own Guilt
A Confession of his Own Guilty
data.synopsis: 1) A Confession of His Own Guilt Story of a high-school student who was sexually assaulted when young, and grew up to be openly homosexual. He always tries to antagonise a teacher whom he doesn't see eye to eye... 2) Risky A university student moves into his brother's apartment in the city but has yet to see his sibling, but the brother's friend just wouldn't stop hanging around. 3) Kimi Sae Oreba... This story is the beginning to one of her book Kimi Sae Ireba... (chapter 1-3). A man marries his supervisor's daughter and she passes away soon after. The supervisor tries to get him to remarry. 4) Kyoushi B A teacher chances upon a teacher-student relationship. (Source: MU)

data.title: Love Price!?
data.synopsis: Growing in an orphanage, Keita had to work and pay for his tuition and for his home expenses. Starving with hunger he fainted later on the streets and was rescued by Kouzuki. Which turns out Kouzuki was a company president! Keita thought he found a solution for his problems so when he asked for a job, the kind of job he thought was not what he intended. Knowing no other way, he agree to be a playmate for Kouzuki. But what would happen if he'd fallen for Kouzuki...? (from B-U)

data.title: Ouchou Haru no Yoi no Romance
data.synopsis: A manga version of the popular Heian period novel focuses on Senjumaru, a chigo at the Nyorin temple of Saga. Young and beautiful, Senjumaru has to withstand constant abuse of conceited monks. However, his teacher and head patriarch of the temple helps Senjumaru escape from their clutches, leaving him with a letter of release. When a government official, Fujiwara Moroe, saves Senjumaru from his pursuers, Senjumaru vows to serve him in return for his kindness. In this story of blossoming young love, will Senjumaru and Moroe be able to show their true affection for each other? (Source: MU)

data.title: Ciao Ciao Bambino
data.synopsis: Very cute pairing (Younger seme and his teacher). The story is puppy love-like but very interesting. I love the way the beautiful younger seme try so hard to protect his lover. I wish there is a sequal to this comic. (from B-U)
